评论概述: They used to be my favorite leggings, but they are different now
评论详情: I used to buy these in an XL, and they were a little baggy but perfect for lounging. I’ve purchased them multiple times over the years, but recently, the fit has changed drastically. The new version is extremely tight in the waist—even though I usually have extra room there.  I sized up to a 1X, but it was still too tight. The 2X was tight in the waist while being overly baggy and awkward everywhere else. I even tried a 3X, and while the waist fit more like the old XL, the rest of the pants looked ridiculously oversized and unwearable.  Unfortunately, I can no longer recommend these. I wish they would return to the previous manufacturer because the new fit is completely off.

I was looking for brushed fleece lined joggers similar to Danskin brushed fleece joggers. Sweatpants? That makes you think they are warm. Not so. The material in no way resembles sweatpants. I don’t recommend wearing them in cold weather. I kept them to wear in somewhat warm weather. They are very thin & not lined to make them warm. Very disappointing!
